referenceObject.reference: Sankaran, P. M., Jobi, M. J., Joseph, M. M. & Sebastian, P. A. (2014). On the genus Hermippus Simon, 1893 (Araneae: Zodariidae, Zodariinae) in India with the description of three new species from the Western Ghats and proposing a new biogeographical hypothesis for the distribution of the genus. Zootaxa 3893(1): 114-126.
